turn.12: A comtemorary commented: "Zürich had a lake, but it [the city] did not see it, and his position [for the public] was almost a secret." The inauguration was held in July 1887, and "Quaibrücke" became the link between the left (Limmat downstream or southerly) and right side of the lake.
